name: Stop War - # Let Humanity Win
description:
Dear Dribbble fellows, ,

Many scientists, educators, students, journalists, artists, singers, actors, engineers, podcasters, designers, illustrators, athletes, medical professionals, software developers, legislators, and more oppose the war. We want it to end. Every day, we hope it will be over.

Let me know your thoughts on that. Your feedback and appreciation is always welcomeüë©‚Äçüíª
